title: Rose Gold Mangalsutra with Diamond Accents - A Timeless Thali Bottu
features: Delicate double-layered chain with interspersed black onyx beads, enhancing the rose gold luster. Features a modern teardrop pendant design encrusted with CZ diamonds, adding a touch of contemporary elegance to the traditional Mangalsutra design. A central diamond accent highlights the upper chain. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear.
occasions: Festive Occasions. Perfect for the modern South Indian woman who appreciates tradition with a contemporary twist.
description: This Mangalsutra seamlessly blends the sacred tradition of marriage with modern aesthetics. Crafted with meticulous detail and high-quality materials, it offers a durable and elegant piece that complements any outfit. The use of rose gold adds a unique touch, setting it apart from traditional yellow gold Mangalsutras. Itâ€™s a symbol of commitment and style.
